Is this an aware or unaware story or do u want a mix?

NOTICE: WHAT EVER PATH U PICK IS THE WAY IT STAYS FOR THE WHOLE TIME!
1.title: Before We Start...

info.brief_description: This is a complete unaware gts story.
info.description:
Ur name is Adam, age 23, and u r half an inch (1/2") tall inside an airport.

*NOTICE*: I reserve the right to delete/edit any chapters if I believe its needed, before I do it u will receive an email regarding it to give u a chance to apeal it with me first.

If u want certain girls in this story u can email me a pic of the girl with info and I will add her in this page for all to know.

RULES:
* NO DEATH!
* No other male tiny's at all.
* No male giant(s)
* No scat/Toilet stuff without my concent via email. (In other words if u want it, u have to email me on site and ask for permission with a reason why. And if u go against my answer I will delete all chapters involving it that u made.)
* No fart stuff.
* If anyone adds to any 'RESERVED' choices without my permission I will delete the chapter and email u with a warning for the 1st offence. If it happens again I will punish u according to past offences.
* More will be added as needed.

Other than that, please add to this story! And there is GP avalible for good adds!
